org.dict.zip

クラス DictZipInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • java.util.zip.InflaterInputStream
          • org.dict.zip.DictZipInputStream
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.io.Closeable

    public class DictZipInputStream
extends java.util.zip.InflaterInputStream
    DictZipInputStream.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • close

        public final void close()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the input stream.
        定義:
        close インタフェース {1} 内の {0} java.io.Closeable
        オーバーライド:
        close クラス {1} 内の {0} java.util.zip.InflaterInputStream
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

      • read

        public final int read(byte[] buf,
       int off,
       int size)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Reads uncompressed data into an array of bytes. Blocks until enough input is available for decompression.
        オーバーライド:
        read クラス {1} 内の {0} java.util.zip.InflaterInputStream
        パラメータ:
        buf - the buffer into which the data is read
        off - the start offset of the data
        size - the maximum number of bytes read
        戻り値:
        the actual number of bytes read, or -1 if the end of the compressed input stream is reached
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred or the compressed input data is corrupt

      • readFully

        public final void readFully(byte[] buf)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Read full data.
        パラメータ:
        buf - the buffer into which the data is read
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred or the compressed input data is corrupt

      • readFully

        public final void readFully(byte[] buf,
             int off,
             int len)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Read full data by offset/length.
        パラメータ:
        buf - the buffer into which the data is read
        off - offset
        len - length
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred or the compressed input data is corrupt

      • readHeader

        public final DictZipHeader readHeader()
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Read dictzip header.
        戻り値:
        header object.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred.
